# Core Rule 5 - In-game administration rulings are final
Admin actions are final, if you have issues with said actions report it in the discord server.
If you cannot get into the discord, feel free to DM armok.
Making new accounts to dodge bans will result in perma bans.
## Examples
### [bold] Permitted [/bold]
- Reporting admin abuse to armok / the discord. - Explaining your side of things to an admin.
### [bold] Not Permitted [/bold]
- Complaining in ahelp over admin rulings. - Ban evasion. - Job ban evasion via in game promotion.
